panels.description: Does not include latency to reach cluster, lag on pod, or overhead to send to k8s tunnel.
panels.title: SSH RTT to API Server P95

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by(le, name) (rate(sky_apiserver_code_duration_seconds_bucket{app="$app", group="function", name=~"sky.global_user_state.*"}[2m])))
histogram_quantile(1, sum by(le, name) (rate(sky_apiserver_code_duration_seconds_bucket{app="$app", group="function", name=~"sky.global_user_state.*"}[2m])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum by(le, name) (rate(sky_apiserver_code_duration_seconds_bucket{app="$app", group="function", name=~"sky.global_user_state.*"}[2m])))
